message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I am still not able to go above $12,000 for the product. I believe that is a fair price given its value to me. I hope we can find common ground.
